page.title: 07Recreation
page.content:
A number of outdoor events are organised throughout the year.
In September a village sports-day is held,which is organised by the parish council.All members of the family are encouraged to take part as there are events for all age groups including the Saughall Mile which is a very popular event.
The Guides hold a fun day in June for the village.The Scouts and Cubs have a bonfire party in November.
The Church Of All Saints hold a Garden Party and the crowning of the Rose Queen is always held in June.
